title: Crime Alert 03.05
itunes:title: Crime Alert 03.05
description:
Police still searching for Missy Bevers killer. An Arizona elementary school teacher allegedly has sex with a boy student in her classroom while another student watches. Wisconsin mom pleads guilty to drowning her son and suffocating two other infants in her care in the 1980s. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
